title: Jonas Lind
text:
Jonas Lind (born 6 June 1962) is a retired Swedish <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He played as <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> and <a href="defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>.
He played for <a href="IFK%20Norrk%C3%B6ping">IFK Norrköping</a> and <a href="IF%20Sylvia">IF Sylvia</a>, both from <a href="Norrk%C3%B6ping">Norrköping</a>. He won <a href="Allsvenskan">Allsvenskan</a> with IFK Norrköping in 1989. He was named the best player in <a href="%C3%96sterg%C3%B6tland">Östergötland</a> in 1992.
He later worked as production manager at <a href="E.ON">E.ON</a> in Norrköping.
